params._fundsShare: result of the game given as a distribution of the funds previously locked

returns._0: GameContext struct for the specified game

returns._isDescartesInstantiated: whether an offchain Descartes computation has been instantiated for this game

returns._0: true if the player is concerned about the game, false otherwise

params._gameTemplateHash: template hash for the Cartesi Machine computation that verifies the game (identifies the game computation/logic)
params._playerFunds: funds/balances that each player is bringing into the game
params._validators: addresses of the validator nodes that will run a Descartes verification should it be needed

params._turnIndex: a sequential number for the turn, which must be equal to the last submitted turn's index + 1

applyVerificationResult(uint256).notice: Applies the result of a game verified by Descartes, transferring funds according to the Descartes computation output

challengeGame(uint256).notice: Challenges game state, triggering a verification by a Descartes computation

claimResult(uint256,uint256[]).notice: Claims game has ended with the provided result (share of locked funds)

getState(uint256,address).notice: Returns state of the instance for offchain usage concerning given validator.

getSubInstances(uint256,address).notice: Retrieves sub-instances of the game (required method for Instantiator, used by offchain dispatcher code).

isConcerned(uint256,address).notice: Indicates whether a given player is concerned about a game

submitTurn(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Submits a new turn for a given game

userdoc.notice: Generic contract for handling turn-based games validated by Descartes computations
